TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
You've misheard. It's not a mystery meat, it's Miss Termit. (The last "e" of her caption was chewed off by other termites.

Waiter! Use Kerbal Alarm Clock instead of waiting.

Waiter: We are waiting on the Kerbal Alarm Clock to get here.

C:W, this soup is making me sleepy.

Zzzzzzzzzzzzzz...

Waiter! Do you have alarm clock?

No, but we have an alarmed crook.

C:W, Someone is stealing my soup.

Waiter! I feel like this thread is dying!

No worries, that's why we have @kerbiloid!

What? How did you say? Kerbaloid? Okay, I'll ask the reception staff.

Hi! Is it a reception or a recipetion?

Waiter. I will get you the cheque.

C:W, could you cheque my soup?

Yes. I will add you to the soup chequeue.

Waiter! Where can you see the W and C letters in the word "restroom"?

Waiter: The whole sign reads WelCome to the restroom.

C:W,Hang on Soupy, Soupy hang on.

Hey, mister! Is it your soup hanging on there?

Waiter! What kind of species is this boiled caterpillar of, so that you call it "dog"? "Hot dog".

Waiter: I will have you know sir that that is the finest Grub we have.

C:W, There is some broth in my soup

Yes, we call our cook Brother because he likes to cook broth, but always eats it himself.

Waiter! Why do all of you here wear the same name on the chest?

Edited November 23, 2021 by kerbiloid

We are all clones.

Waiter! There's a MÃƒÂ¼n in my soup!

Waiter: Yes, instead of alphabet soup that is our algebraic soup.

C:W, Is the secret to life, the universe and everything, in my soup?

Yes. It's for tea, too.

Waiter! Please, a fresh fugu fish and two balloons of oxygen.

Waiter: Sorry we mixed up the order. Here, have a fish balloon, be careful though as this balloon pops other things.

C:W, one Babel fish over ear.

Waiter: Sorry, we have been in stasis for the last 300 years.

C:W, My soup has gone cold.

It's our special Titan soup, made of liquid hydrocarbons. It hadn't gone cold, it has gotten melted.

Waiter! 'Oamuamua potatoroid fries!

Waiter: We are waiting on a giant potatoroid peeler.

C:W, There is a White Hole replenishing my Soup.

That's why we recommend our clients have a sit at the tables under umbrella. That's not a White Hole, that's a crow had flown over.

Waiter! If this is a soup from swallow nests, where are the swallow eggs?

The swallow eggs have hatched and have biodegraded

waiter, a black hole is eating my soup

Waiter: Hey Lorenzo, I told you we shouldn't have an "All you can eat" special.

C:W, A straw please.

Somebody has eaten all straw, sir. We have only straw berries. Should I bring it?

Waiter, is it a joke? How could I smell this wine through the mask?

Waiter: I was more impressed by you drinking it through the mask sir.

C:W, What is the soup of the day?

From pork and barley. It's the Freya day today after all.

Garcon! Garlic!
